name: Asylopole
description:
Asylopole is a satirical old-school adventure game set in a dystopian future. You play the role of Adam, a psychiatrist working in a gigantic asylum.
Get inside your patients’ heads to find out what’s gone wrong. Experience totally new universes and fight your patients’ worst nightmares...
Features:
  • Classic style Adventure with alternative gameplay elements
  • Non-linear
  • 2D hand drawn graphics, rotoscoping, stop-motion
  • 80's feeling
  • Varied gameplay: exploration, puzzles, fights,...
  • Quests, mini-games, network (Ultranet),...
  • Created mostly by one person
  • Adjustable difficulty
  • Controllers support
  • Gain EXP and increase your stats
  • Eat nice Fastbouf burgers ( look at that sauce dripping down ! )
